channel.title: Just my thoughts and ramblings while I learn to use The Grid
channel.description: Just my thoughts and ramblings while I learn to use The Grid

item.title: Chris Hadfield: What I learned from going blind in space
item.description:
Chris Hadfield: What I learned from going blind in space

There's an astronaut saying: In space, "there is no problem so bad that you can't make it worse." So how do you deal with the complexity, the sheer pressure, of dealing with dangerous and scary situations?

item.title: When Data Just Isn't Enough: The Hidden Context that's Key to Content Loyalty
item.description:
When Data Just Isn't Enough: The Hidden Context that's Key to Content Loyalty

When the client asked to "go mute" during our monthly client call, there was no reason to sound the alarm. After all, being able to talk through what they've heard as a team, in private, was normal.
